title: I Love Uniforms♡
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Please, please! P~l~e~a~s~e~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….No<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Please don’t say that! You let Rin and the others play with your hair, right? It’s the same as that! Listen to my request too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Seriously, just how far has that story spread....? Look, even someone like me have requests that I would and wouldn’t listen to<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>But.... when I saw this uniform, I thought, “This uniform was made to be worn by Maki-chan!”.... Put a belt around a khaki jacket, show a peek of white shirt and navy blue necktie from the chest area. A tight skirt and a firm stance on a full-body silhouette.... See? Isn’t this basically you, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>“See”? What do you mean “See”? I don’t get it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Do you need more explanation? How much more do I have to explain until you wear it? I’ll feel sorry for this uniform if you don’t wear it, Maki-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Aaaaaaaah! Okay, I get it! Just for a bit, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yaay-! Thank you, Maki-chan! I’ll take care of the pictures!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You won’t take any pictures. Also, wear something too, You. Isn’t it weird if I’m.... the only one that wears this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
